text: Cruel Intentions 3 is a 2004 American teen drama film directed by Scott Ziehl and released direct-to-video in 2004. Despite its name, the film has almost no relation to the previous films in the series, except for the shared themes and the lead character in this film, Cassidy Merteuil, who is a cousin of one of the characters from the first film, Kathryn Merteuil. == Other websites == * Category:2004 LGBT movies Category:2004 romantic drama movies Category:2000s teen drama movies Category:2000s teen romance movies Category:American LGBT movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:American teen drama movies Category:American teen romance movies Category:2000s English-language movies Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Narcissism in fiction Category:Teen LGBT movies Category:Cruel Intentions movies
title: Cruel Intentions 3
